__e: That's my business and, Merlin, don't be here when I come back.
Unless you can see in the dark, Merlin, there's not much else to do.
Merlin, it's not always possible to know what's in the mind of another man.
One more word out of you, you'll take the challenge in my place.
His name is Merlin- and he's not welcome here!
You're not yet fully recovered, Merlin and it's more than three days walk.
